org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.igfs

Class IgfsUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.igfs.IgfsUtils

  • public class IgfsUtils
extends Object
    Common IGFS utility methods.

      • fixUserName

        public static String fixUserName(@Nullable
                                 String user)
        Provides non-null user name. If the user name is null or empty string, defaults to FileSystemConfiguration.DFLT_USER_NAME, which is the current process owner user.
        Parameters:
        user - a user name to be fixed.
        Returns:
        non-null interned user name.

        public static boolean canContain(IgfsMode parent,
                                 IgfsMode child)

        Parameters:
        parent - Parent mode.
        child - Child mode.
        Returns:

      • preparePathModes

        public static ArrayList<T2<IgfsPath,IgfsMode>> preparePathModes(IgfsMode dfltMode,
                                                                @Nullable
                                                                List<T2<IgfsPath,IgfsMode>> modes,
                                                                Set<IgfsPath> dualParentsContainingPrimaryChildren)
                                                         throws IgniteCheckedException
        Checks, filters and sorts the modes.
        Parameters:
        dfltMode - The root mode. Must always be not null.
        modes - The subdirectory modes.
        dualParentsContainingPrimaryChildren - The set to store parents into.
        Returns:
        Descending list of filtered and checked modes.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - On error.
